# recipientsOperator

**Instance Property**

The operator that defines how to use the recipients in the search criteria.

## Declaration

```swift
var recipientsOperator: INConditionalOperator { get }
```

## Discussion

This property indicates whether the message must contain all, some, or none of the people listed in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSearchForMessagesIntent/recipients] property.

## Getting the Senders and Recipients

- **recipients**: The contacts who are the recipients of the messages.
- **senders**: The senders to include or exclude when you search for messages.
- **sendersOperator**: The operator that defines how to use the senders in the search criteria.
- **speakableGroupNames**: The names of any groups associated with the message.
- **speakableGroupNamesOperator**: The operator that defines how to use the group names in the search criteria.
